# [Brand Name] Color Palette

**Generated by Color Forge** | Version 2.0 | [Date]

---

## Overview

[Brief description of the palette and the design decisions that shaped it.]

**Harmony Model**: [Analogous/Triadic/etc.]
**Color Space**: OKLCH (perceptually uniform)
**WCAG Level**: AA compliant (AAA for critical text)

---

## Quick Reference

### Magic Numbers (Grade Difference = Guaranteed Contrast)

| Grade Diff | Contrast | WCAG Level | Use For |
|-----------|----------|------------|---------|
| **30** | ~3:1 | AA Large/UI | Icons, borders, large text |
| **40** | ~4.5:1 | AA | Normal text |
| **50** | ~7:1 | AAA | Enhanced accessibility |

**Example**: Text at grade 700 on background grade 100 = diff **60** → Exceeds AAA ✅

### 60-30-10 Distribution

| % | Role | This Palette |
|---|------|--------------|
| **60%** | Dominant (backgrounds) | Neutral 50-100 |
| **30%** | Secondary (cards, nav) | Neutral 200-300, Secondary |
| **10%** | Accent (CTAs, highlights) | Primary 500, Accent 500 |

---

## ⚠️ Gamut Warning

OKLCH can represent colors outside the sRGB gamut. All colors in this palette have been **gamut-mapped to sRGB** for web compatibility. The HEX values are the authoritative values for implementation.

---

## Primary Color

### [Color Name] (e.g., "Ocean Blue")

The primary color represents [brand aspect]. It evokes [emotional qualities].

**Base**: `#2196F3` / `oklch(58% 0.18 250)`

| Grade | HEX | OKLCH | Usage |
|-------|-----|-------|-------|
| 50 | #E3F2FD | oklch(97% 0.02 250) | Tinted backgrounds |
| 100 | #BBDEFB | oklch(93% 0.04 250) | Light backgrounds |
| 200 | #90CAF9 | oklch(87% 0.08 250) | Borders, dividers |
| 300 | #64B5F6 | oklch(78% 0.12 250) | Disabled states |
| 400 | #42A5F5 | oklch(68% 0.16 250) | Secondary elements |
| **500** | **#2196F3** | **oklch(58% 0.18 250)** | **Primary actions** |
| 600 | #1E88E5 | oklch(48% 0.18 250) | Hover states |
| 700 | #1976D2 | oklch(38% 0.18 250) | Active/pressed |
| 800 | #1565C0 | oklch(28% 0.12 250) | Strong emphasis |
| 900 | #0D47A1 | oklch(18% 0.08 250) | Text on light |

## Neutral Colors

### [Neutral Name] (e.g., "Slate")

Neutrals form 60-70% of your UI. Used for backgrounds, text, borders, and disabled states.

**Base**: `#737373` / `oklch(50% 0 0)` (pure gray, no chroma)

| Grade | HEX | OKLCH | Usage |
|-------|-----|-------|-------|
| 50 | #FAFAFA | oklch(98% 0 0) | Page backgrounds |
| 100 | #F5F5F5 | oklch(96% 0 0) | Card backgrounds |
| 200 | #E5E5E5 | oklch(90% 0 0) | Borders, dividers |
| 300 | #D4D4D4 | oklch(80% 0 0) | Disabled backgrounds |
| 400 | #A3A3A3 | oklch(65% 0 0) | Placeholder text |
| 500 | #737373 | oklch(50% 0 0) | Secondary text |
| 600 | #525252 | oklch(40% 0 0) | Body text |
| 700 | #404040 | oklch(30% 0 0) | Headings |
| 800 | #262626 | oklch(20% 0 0) | Strong text |
| 900 | #171717 | oklch(12% 0 0) | Maximum contrast |

---

## Status Colors

Universal meanings - maintain consistency across all products.

| Status | Name | HEX | OKLCH | Usage |
|--------|------|-----|-------|-------|
| **Success** | [Name] | #22C55E | oklch(65% 0.2 145) | Confirmations, completed |
| **Warning** | [Name] | #F59E0B | oklch(75% 0.18 70) | Caution, attention needed |
| **Error** | [Name] | #EF4444 | oklch(60% 0.22 25) | Errors, destructive |
| **Info** | [Name] | #3B82F6 | oklch(58% 0.2 260) | Informational, help |

**Note**: Status colors are calibrated to be distinguishable for common color blindness types.

---

## Magic Number Accessibility Guide

### Light Mode Pairings

| Use Case | Foreground | Background | Grade Diff | Status |
|----------|------------|------------|------------|--------|
| Body text | Neutral-700 | Neutral-50 | 65 | ✅ AAA |
| Headings | Neutral-900 | Neutral-50 | 86 | ✅ AAA |
| Primary buttons | White | Primary-500 | 58 | ✅ AA |
| Secondary text | Neutral-500 | Neutral-50 | 48 | ✅ AA |
| Borders | Neutral-300 | Neutral-50 | 18 | ✅ UI |
| Links | Primary-600 | Neutral-50 | 56 | ✅ AA |

### Dark Mode Pairings

| Use Case | Foreground | Background | Grade Diff | Status |
|----------|------------|------------|------------|--------|
| Body text | Neutral-200 | Neutral-900 | 78 | ✅ AAA |
| Headings | Neutral-50 | Neutral-900 | 86 | ✅ AAA |
| Primary buttons | Neutral-900 | Primary-400 | 56 | ✅ AA |
| Secondary text | Neutral-400 | Neutral-900 | 53 | ✅ AA |
| Borders | Neutral-700 | Neutral-900 | 18 | ✅ UI |
| Links | Primary-300 | Neutral-900 | 66 | ✅ AAA |

---

## Dark Mode Recommendations

### Palette Mapping

| Light Mode | Dark Mode | Notes |
|------------|-----------|-------|
| Neutral-50 (bg) | Neutral-900 | Invert backgrounds |
| Neutral-900 (text) | Neutral-100 | Invert text |
| Primary-500 | Primary-400 | Lighten primary for dark bg |
| Primary-600 (hover) | Primary-300 | Lighten hover states |
| Neutral-200 (border) | Neutral-700 | Invert borders |

### CSS Implementation

```css
:root {
  --color-bg: var(--neutral-50);
  --color-text: var(--neutral-900);
  --color-primary: var(--primary-500);
}

@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
  :root {
    --color-bg: var(--neutral-900);
    --color-text: var(--neutral-100);
    --color-primary: var(--primary-400);
  }
}
```

---

## Token Hierarchy

### Level 1: Primitive Tokens (Raw Values)

```css
:root {
  /* Primary Scale */
  --primary-50: #E3F2FD;
  --primary-100: #BBDEFB;
  --primary-500: #2196F3;
  --primary-700: #1976D2;
  --primary-900: #0D47A1;

  /* Neutral Scale */
  --neutral-50: #FAFAFA;
  --neutral-100: #F5F5F5;
  --neutral-500: #737373;
  --neutral-900: #171717;

  /* Status */
  --success-500: #22C55E;
  --warning-500: #F59E0B;
  --error-500: #EF4444;
  --info-500: #3B82F6;
}
```

### Level 2: Semantic Tokens (Purpose-Based)

```css
:root {
  /* Backgrounds */
  --color-bg-primary: var(--neutral-50);
  --color-bg-secondary: var(--neutral-100);
  --color-bg-inverse: var(--neutral-900);

  /* Text */
  --color-text-primary: var(--neutral-900);
  --color-text-secondary: var(--neutral-500);
  --color-text-inverse: var(--neutral-50);

  /* Interactive */
  --color-interactive: var(--primary-500);
  --color-interactive-hover: var(--primary-600);
  --color-interactive-active: var(--primary-700);

  /* Status */
  --color-success: var(--success-500);
  --color-warning: var(--warning-500);
  --color-error: var(--error-500);
  --color-info: var(--info-500);

  /* Borders */
  --color-border: var(--neutral-200);
  --color-border-strong: var(--neutral-300);
}
```

### Level 3: Component Tokens (Optional)

```css
:root {
  /* Buttons */
  --button-primary-bg: var(--color-interactive);
  --button-primary-bg-hover: var(--color-interactive-hover);
  --button-primary-text: var(--color-text-inverse);

  /* Cards */
  --card-bg: var(--color-bg-secondary);
  --card-border: var(--color-border);

  /* Inputs */
  --input-bg: var(--color-bg-primary);
  --input-border: var(--color-border);
  --input-border-focus: var(--color-interactive);
}
```

---

## CSS with OKLCH (Modern Browsers)

For browsers supporting OKLCH (Chrome 111+, Safari 15.4+, Firefox 113+):

```css
:root {
  /* With fallbacks */
  --primary-500: #2196F3;
  --primary-500: oklch(58% 0.18 250);

  --neutral-900: #171717;
  --neutral-900: oklch(12% 0 0);
}
```

### PostCSS/Build Tool Approach

```css
/* Source (OKLCH) */
.button {
  background: oklch(58% 0.18 250);
}

/* Compiled (with fallback) */
.button {
  background: #2196F3;
  background: oklch(58% 0.18 250);
}
```

---

## Tailwind CSS Config

```javascript
// tailwind.config.js
module.exports = {
  theme: {
    colors: {
      primary: {
        50: '#E3F2FD',
        100: '#BBDEFB',
        200: '#90CAF9',
        300: '#64B5F6',
        400: '#42A5F5',
        500: '#2196F3',
        600: '#1E88E5',
        700: '#1976D2',
        800: '#1565C0',
        900: '#0D47A1',
      },
      neutral: {
        50: '#FAFAFA',
        100: '#F5F5F5',
        200: '#E5E5E5',
        300: '#D4D4D4',
        400: '#A3A3A3',
        500: '#737373',
        600: '#525252',
        700: '#404040',
        800: '#262626',
        900: '#171717',
      },
      // Secondary, Accent, Status...
    },
  },
}
```

---

## Usage Guidelines

### The 60-30-10 Rule Applied

```
Page Layout:
┌─────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  Navigation (30% - Neutral-100/Primary) │
├─────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                         │
│  Main Content Area                      │
│  (60% - Neutral-50 background)          │
│                                         │
│  ┌─────────────┐  ┌─────────────┐      │
│  │ Card        │  │ Card        │      │
│  │ (30%)       │  │ (30%)       │      │
│  │             │  │             │      │
│  │ [CTA 10%]   │  │ [CTA 10%]   │      │
│  └─────────────┘  └─────────────┘      │
│                                         │
└─────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

### Do's ✅

- Use Primary-500+ for text on light backgrounds
- Use grade difference 40+ for all readable text
- Apply 60-30-10 for visual balance
- Test in both light and dark modes
- Use semantic tokens, not raw values

### Don'ts ❌

- Don't use Primary-400 or lighter for text (fails contrast)
- Don't exceed 10% accent color coverage
- Don't create colors outside this palette
- Don't rely on color alone for meaning
- Don't skip dark mode testing
